Miscellaneous Tools¶

In addition to basic infrastructure for a coupled model, CIME contains in its distribution several stand-alone tools that are necessary and/or useful when building a climate model. Guides for using them will be here.

  • 1. Fortran Unit Testing
    • 1.1. Introduction
      • 1.1.1. What is a unit test?
      • 1.1.2. Overview of unit test support in CIME
    • 1.2. Running CIME’s Fortran unit tests
    • 1.3. How to add unit testing support on your machine
      • 1.3.1. Building pFUnit
      • 1.3.2. Adding to the xml file
    • 1.4. How to write a new unit test
    • 1.5. More details on writing your own unit tests
      • 1.5.1. General guidelines for writing unit tests
      • 1.5.2. Defining a test class in order to define setUp and tearDown methods
      • 1.5.3. More on test teardown
      • 1.5.4. pFUnit documentation and examples
    • 1.6. Finding more documentation and examples in CIME
      • 1.6.1. Documentation of the unit test build system
      • 1.6.2. Finding more detailed examples
